63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah:The moon was split ( into two pieces ) while we were with the Prophet (ﷺ) in Mina. He said, "Be witnesses." Then a Piece of the moon went towards the mountain

chapter.eng-name: The splitting of the moon (into two pieces)
